USERNAME_RESTRICTIONS.zh: 名称仅包含字母数字_-，长度5-20个字符
USERNAME_RESTRICTIONS.en: Username contains 5-20 characters, including alphabet, number, ' _ ' and ' - '

PASSWORD_RESTRICTIONS.zh: 密码限制：最少8个字符，至少包含一个大写字母，一个小写字母，一个数字和一个特殊字符
PASSWORD_RESTRICTIONS.en: Password Restrictions: Minimum 8 characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character

INVALID_USERNAME_OR_PASSWORD.zh: 不合法的用戶名称或密码

ONE_ADMIN_REQUIRED.en: At least one administrator is required.

SITENAME_RESTRICTIONS.zh: Site 名称仅包含字母数字_-，长度小於15个字符
SITENAME_RESTRICTIONS.en: Site name should not exceed 15 characters, including alphabet, number, ' _ ' and ' - '

CONTROLLERNAME_RESTRICTIONS.zh: 控制器名称仅包含字母数字_-，长度小於15个字符
CONTROLLERNAME_RESTRICTIONS.en: Controller name should not exceed 15 characters, including alphabet, number, ' _ ' and ' - '

INVALID_SITENAME.zh: 不合法的 Site 名称

INVALID_CONTROLLERNAME.zh: 不合法的 控制器 名称

INVALID_IP_ADDRESS.zh: 不合法的 IP 位址

GENERATING_TOKEN_ERROR.zh: 产生令牌 Token 错误

ENCODING_TOKEN_ERROR.zh: 编码令牌 Token 错误

AUTH_HEADER_NOT_BEARER.zh: Authorization header 不是 “Bearer” 类型
AUTH_HEADER_NOT_BEARER.en: Authorization header is not of type 'Bearer'.

AUTH_HEADER_INVALID_PATTERN.zh: Authorization header 必须遵循以下模式：'Bearer xx.yy.zz' 其中 xx.yy.zz 是有效的 JWT 令牌
AUTH_HEADER_INVALID_PATTERN.en: Authorization header value must follow the pattern: 'Bearer xx.yy.zz' where xx.yy.zz is a valid JWT token.

INVALID_OR_EXPIRED_TOKEN.zh: JWT 令牌已过期或无效
INVALID_OR_EXPIRED_TOKEN.en: JWT token is invalid or expired.
